meanings.definition: a machine or device used to pasteurize food or beverages
meanings.sent1: The pasteurizers at the dairy ensure that the milk is safe to drink.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant invested in new pasteurizers to improve food safety.
meanings.sent3: The pasteurizers in the kitchen were always busy, like little food guardians.
meanings.sent4: The pasteurizers hummed softly, turning raw milk into liquid gold.
meanings.sent5: The pasteurizers stood tall, their steamy breath purifying the liquid within.

meanings.definition: the plural form of pasteurizer, referring to multiple machines or devices used for pasteurization
meanings.sent1: The factory had several pasteurizers working around the clock.
meanings.sent2: The pasteurizers in the production line were all in sync.
meanings.sent3: The pasteurizers chatted among themselves, discussing the best way to kill bacteria.
meanings.sent4: The pasteurizers lined up like soldiers, ready to battle against germs.
meanings.sent5: The pasteurizers glowed in the dim room, a symbol of food safety.
